titleStmt.title: The perfect politician, or, A full view of the life and action (military and civil) of O. Cromwel whereunto is added his character, and a compleat catalogue of all the honours conferr'd by him on several persons.
titleStmt.author: Fletcher, Henry.
Raybould, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Cottrel, for William Roybould ... and Henry Fletcher ...,

notesStmt.note: Ascribed to Henry Fletcher. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.); Stonehill; Wing.
Also attributed to William Raybould. Cf. Abbot, W.C. bibliography of Oliver Cromwell, 1929.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
